headline: Has The Market Mispriced AES After Its Recent Recovery In 2025?
summary: If you have been wondering whether AES is quietly turning into a value opportunity or just another utility stock stuck in neutral, you are in the right place. Despite a choppy few years, AES is up 11.6% over the last year and 6.0% year to date, even though the 3 year return is still down a steep 44.0% from earlier highs. Recently, AES has been in the spotlight as investors reassess the long term prospects of its power generation and renewables portfolio and how it fits into the broader...
